meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of plants in the family Araceae.
meanings.sent1: The araceous leaves of the plant were broad and glossy.
meanings.sent2: The araceous flowers bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The araceous plant seemed to be showing off its fancy family roots.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a jungle of araceous wonders, each plant a unique member of the family.
meanings.sent5: The araceous characteristics of the plant made it easy to identify among others.

meanings.definition: Resembling or pertaining to the arum plant.
meanings.sent1: The araceous scent of the flower reminded her of the arum plant.
meanings.sent2: The araceous shape of the leaf closely resembled that of the arum plant.
meanings.sent3: The araceous pattern on the vase mimicked the arum plant's distinctive look.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had an araceous design that echoed the elegance of the arum plant.
meanings.sent5: The araceous features of the painting captured the essence of the arum plant perfectly.

meanings.definition: Covered with fine, soft hairs or down.
meanings.sent1: The araceous texture of the leaf felt soft and velvety to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The araceous surface of the fruit was delicate and fuzzy.
meanings.sent3: The araceous coat on the puppy made it look even more adorable.
meanings.sent4: Her scarf was as araceous as a cloud, adding a cozy touch to her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The araceous covering on the caterpillar protected it from the harsh elements.
